TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable beforefieldinit UpdateItemType extends ExchangeWebServices.BaseRequestType

summary.span: 类表示请求更新一项。

span.span: The class represents a request to update a set of items.

span.para: 您可以追加、 设置或更新的项时删除属性。
如果您尝试提交更改的说明，包括多个属性，若要修改，会返回错误。
You can append, set, or delete properties when you update an item.
If you try to submit a change description that includes more than one property to modify, an error will be returned.
下面的代码示例演示如何更新会议。本示例执行以下操作：

item.description: 向会议添加新的必需的与会者。
到客户端上的当前时间更新会议的开始时间。
向会议添加自定义的 MAPI 属性。
删除所有的可选与会者。
自动解决任何冲突，在更新操作。
发送给所有与会者的会议更新和文件夹中保存一份更新的会议请求属性标识。

span.para: 注释： 请求中的项标识符和更改密钥具有缩短，若要保留可读性。
The following code example shows you how to update a meeting. This example performs the following actions:

item.description: Adds a new required attendee to the meeting.
Updates the start time of the meeting to the current time on the client.
Adds a custom MAPI property to the meeting.
Automatically resolves any conflicts in the update operation.
Sends the meeting update to all attendees and saves a copy of the updated meeting request in the folder that the property identifies.

span.para: Note: The item identifier and change key in the request have been shortened to preserve readability.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

summary.span: 构造函数初始化的新实例类。

span.span: The constructor initializes a new instance of the class.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property ExchangeWebServices::ConflictResolutionType ConflictResolution { ExchangeWebServices::ConflictResolutionType get(); void set(ExchangeWebServices::ConflictResolutionType value); };

summary.span: 属性获取或设置一个值，该值代表指定在冲突解决更新期间执行的类型的枚举值。

span.span: The property gets or sets an enumeration value that represents the type of conflict resolution that is performed during an update.

summary.span: 此属性是必需的。

span.span: This property is required.

summary.span: 这是一个读/写属性。

span.span: This is a read/write property.
The property returns a enumeration.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property cli::array <ExchangeWebServices::ItemChangeType ^> ^ ItemChanges { cli::array <ExchangeWebServices::ItemChangeType ^> ^ get(); void set(cli::array <ExchangeWebServices::ItemChangeType ^> ^ value); };

summary.span: 属性获取或设置一个数组项的更改。

span.span: The property gets or sets an array of item changes.

summary.span: 此属性是必需的。

span.span: This property is required.

summary.span: 这是一个读/写属性。

span.span: This is a read/write property.
The property returns an array.

span.para: 在每个元素数组对应于要更改 Exchange 数据库中的单个项。
Each element in the array corresponds to a single item to be changed in the Exchange database.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property ExchangeWebServices::MessageDispositionType MessageDisposition { ExchangeWebServices::MessageDispositionType get(); void set(ExchangeWebServices::MessageDispositionType value); };

summary.span: 属性获取或设置一个枚举值，介绍更新后的邮件项目的处理方式。

span.span: The property gets or sets an enumeration value that describes how a message item is handled after it is updated.

summary.span: 此属性是必需的邮件项目，包括会议消息，如会议取消、 会议请求和会议响应。

span.span: This property is required for message items, including meeting messages such as meeting cancellations, meeting requests, and meeting responses.

summary.span: 这是一个读/写属性。

span.span: This is a read/write property.
The property returns a enumeration value.

span.para: 必须设置属性设置为true ，以便属性序列化为简单对象访问协议 (SOAP) 请求。
You must set the property to true so that the property is serialized into the Simple Object Access Protocol (SOAP) request.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool MessageDispositionSpecified { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 属性获取或设置一个 Boolean 值，指定是否属性序列化为简单对象访问协议 (SOAP) 请求。

span.span: The property gets or sets a Boolean value that specifies whether the property is serialized into the Simple Object Access Protocol (SOAP) request.

summary.span: 此属性是必需的如果属性设置。

span.span: This property is required if the property is set.

summary.span: 这是一个读/写属性。

span.span: This is a read/write property.

value.span: 属性返回true ，如果到简单对象访问协议 (SOAP) 请求; 序列化属性否则，该属性返回false。

span.span: The property returns true if the property is serialized into the Simple Object Access Protocol (SOAP) request; otherwise, the property returns false.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property ExchangeWebServices::TargetFolderIdType ^ SavedItemFolderId { ExchangeWebServices::TargetFolderIdType ^ get(); void set(ExchangeWebServices::TargetFolderIdType ^ value); };

summary.span: 属性获取或设置用于保存的项目的目标文件夹。

span.span: The property gets or sets the target folder for saved items.

summary.span: 此属性设置使用或对象。

span.span: This property is set with either a or object.

summary.span: 此属性是可选的。

span.span: This property is optional.

summary.span: 这是一个读/写属性。

span.span: This is a read/write property.

value.span: 属性返回对象，它可以强制转换为或对象。

span.span: The property returns a object that can be cast to either a or object.

span.para: 如果未设置此属性，及以下任意或属性设置，以便可以保存副本，则保存的项目的默认位置将为已发送邮件文件夹。
If this property is not set and either the or the property is set so that a copy is saved, the default location for saved items will be the Sent Items folder.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property ExchangeWebServices::CalendarItemUpdateOperationType SendMeetingInvitationsOrCancellations { ExchangeWebServices::CalendarItemUpdateOperationType get(); void set(ExchangeWebServices::CalendarItemUpdateOperationType value); };

summary.span: 属性获取或设置一个枚举值，介绍更新后的日历项目的处理方式。

span.span: The property gets or sets an enumeration value that describes how a calendar item is handled after it is updated.

summary.span: 此属性是必需的日历项目。

span.span: This property is required for calendar items.

summary.span: 这是一个读/写属性。

span.span: This is a read/write property.
The property returns a enumeration value.

span.para: 必须设置属性设置为true ，以便属性序列化为简单对象访问协议 (SOAP) 请求。
You must set the property to true so that the property is serialized into the Simple Object Access Protocol (SOAP) request.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool SendMeetingInvitationsOrCancellationsSpecified { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 属性获取或设置一个 Boolean 值，指定是否属性序列化为简单对象访问协议 (SOAP) 请求。

span.span: The property gets or sets a Boolean value that specifies whether the property is serialized into the Simple Object Access Protocol (SOAP) request.

summary.span: 此属性是必需的如果属性设置。

span.span: This property is required if the property is set.

summary.span: 这是一个读/写属性。

span.span: This is a read/write property.

value.span: 属性返回true ，如果到 SOAP 请求; 序列化属性否则，该属性返回false。

span.span: The property returns true if the property is serialized into the SOAP request; otherwise, the property returns false.
